title: Utilizing IMS Learning Design for Organizational Learning Process Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of organizational learning theories, basic concepts of IMS Learning Design (LD), and experience utilizing simulation/VR environments
context.additional_context: Simulation-based replication of workplace mathematical problem-solving processes, modeling learning through interaction among multiple roles (student-instructor-peer)

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical problem-solving scenarios as multi-role activities using IMS Learning Design (IMS LD).
Learners can implement stages of the Group-Oriented Action Process (GOAP) organizational learning model in a simulation environment.
Learners can evaluate and improve role-specific learning activities using VR-based collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
